summary: SAME AS I HAVE SEEN ON THE SITE, THE 1994 DODGE INTREPID IS STOPPING WHILE IN MOTION. AT FIRST, IT WOULD START AGAIN IMMEDIATELY, THEN AFTER A FEW MOMENTS, THEN HOURS.. AND NOW IT IS UP TO NOT STARTING AT ALL. WE HAVE REPLACED SEVERAL PARTS AND NOTHING SEEMS TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE. DO YOU HAVE ANY IDEA WHAT THE PROBLEM CAN BE? PLEASE EMAIL WITH IDEAS..   *NLM
